name: ENDURACE - Drift Or Die
description:
ENDURACE

Defy the inevitable and be the last racer standing in a traditional lap race or a race to the death. Repair your car by smashing others with extreme violence and style!

Will you end the race, or will the race end you?

HOW TO PLAY DRIVING Button(s) Action W / Up Arrow Accelerate / Forward Roll (Air Control) S / Down Arrow Brakes / Backwards Roll (Air Control) A / Left Arrow Steer Left D / Right Arrow Steer Right IN THE AIR Button(s) Action W / Up Arrow Forward Roll S / Down Arrow Backwards Roll FEATURES
  • Two distinct race tracks
    • Lap Race: Complete 5 laps and stay alive!
    • Death Race: Complete laps until everyone else is dead!
  • Unrelenting destruction
  • Old school arcade driving style
  • Airtime!

Play the downloadable Version if possible - we had some last minute performance issues with WebGL
